submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        h_p = 1
        v_p = 1
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        p1 = len(horizontalCut) - 1
        p2 = len(verticalCut) - 1
        cost = 0
        while(p1>=0 and p2>=0):
            if horizontalCut[p1] > verticalCut[p2]:
                cost += horizontalCut[p1] * v_p
                p1 -= 1
                h_p += 1
            else:
                cost += verticalCut[p2] * h_p
                p2 -= 1
                v_p += 1
        while(p1>=0):
            cost += horizontalCut[p1] * v_p
            p1 -= 1
            h_p += 1
        while(p2>=0):
            cost += verticalCut[p2] * h_p
            p2 -= 1
            v_p += 1
        return cost
